title: Duas aldeias evacuadas após explosões em paiol de munições na Rússia, foi declarado estado de emergência
cleaned_sentences: A fire launched, on Tuesday, in a paiol of ammunition in the Vladimir region, in western Russia, and caused several explosions.
The Russian Ministry of Defense says there was "a violation of security standards."
Two villages were evacuated and declared a state of emergency in the Vladimir region.
The explosions took place in a paiol of artillery and missiles of the Russian army, next to the village of Barsovo.
The Russian Ministry of Defense says there was a "violation of safety standards at work with explosive materials."
The incident will be investigated by a commission created specifically for the case, informs.
According to preliminary information, there are no victims, however, the explosions resulted in the detonation of ammunition.
Russian authorities declared a state of emergency in the Vladimir region, says state news agency Tass, which cites emergency services.
Two evacuated villages "All the inhabitants of Barsovo are being removed to schools No.
6 and 7 of Krasny Oktiabr village in Kirzhach district," said local authorities, according to the official news agency Tass, which also announced the withdrawal of Mirnoe inhabitants.
The governor of the Vladimir region, Alexandr Avdeyev, wrote on the Telegram platform that "the responsible services are working on site."
